title: Claiming the Knights
description: The Northwest Knights MC has it's share of free men. The ladies involved with these free agents are all after one thing. Getting claimed by them. After being in critical care would Scooter survive? Would Nikki be there for him or would she continue her plan to move on. The horrible accident that put him in that hospital bed would prove to bring more angst to the club. None of them saw it coming. In the process of taking care of business the Brothers of the Northwest Knights would find love and loyalty in the most unexpected ways. And the women that came in and out of their lives would prove to challenge them beyond what they thought they could give.
author: S.E. Leonard
